column2: Job Description: As the General Manager of Technical Design, you will be responsible for overseeing the technical design aspects of our projects. You will lead a team of design engineers across multiple disciplines and ensure the timely delivery and quality of engineering solutions. Your role will involve managing relationships with MNC customers, particularly in the oil and gas and petroleum refinery sectors, and addressing their design and technical concerns. Responsibilities: Lead and manage a team of design engineers specializing in mechanical design, process design, structural design, FEA, CFD, and piping stress analysis. Ensure compliance with ASME, IBR, TEMA, API codes, and other relevant industry standards. Identify and engage engineering services partners as needed to support project requirements. Oversee the overall design and engineering process, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to quality standards. Act as a primary point of contact for MNC customers, addressing their design and technical issues effectively. Collaborate with other departments, including sales, operations, and project management, to meet contractual obligations and customer expectations. Provide technical expertise and guidance to the design team, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation. Requirements: A bachelor's degree in engineering (mechanical or related field) is required. Minimum 20 years of experience in handling mechanical design, process design, structural design, FEA, CFD, and piping stress analysis. Strong knowledge of ASME, IBR, TEMA, API codes, and other relevant industry standards. Proven leadership experience with the ability to manage a team of design engineers effectively. Experience in managing relationships with MNC customers, particularly in the oil and gas and petroleum refineries sectors. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders. Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to addressing technical challenges.
column11: Structural Design, Mechanical Design, Process Design, Stress Analysis, Piping Stress Analysis, CFD, FEA, API Codes, Piping Layout

column2: JD For  Jr/Sr. Designer Responsibilities:  - Leadership and Mentorship:  Lead and mentor a team of product designers, providing guidance and oversight throughout the design process.  Foster a collaborative and creative work environment that encourages innovation and excellence.  - Conceptualization and Ideation:  Generate and develop creative concepts for new products, considering functionality, aesthetics, and market trends.  Utilize Autodesk Fusion 360 and other design tools to bring concepts to life through 3D modeling and prototyping.  - Design Development:  Translate concepts into detailed product designs, incorporating feedback and ensuring alignment with manufacturing capabilities.  Collaborate closely with engineers, craftsmen, and vendors to optimize designs for production.  - Project Management:  Oversee multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.  Communicate project milestones and updates effectively to stakeholders and senior management.  - Collaboration and Communication:  Collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineers, marketers, and production managers to drive successful product launches.  - Communicate design concepts and requirements clearly and effectively to internal and external stakeholders.   Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Industrial Design, Product Design, or related field; Master's degree preferred.  Minimum of 5 years of proven experience with a strong portfolio showcasing successful product launches.  Proficiency in CAD software, especially Autodesk Fusion 360, for 3D modeling and prototyping.  Excellent leadership, communication, and project management skills.  Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.   Preferred Qualifications:  Background in Product Design, Furniture Design, or related disciplines.  Experience leading design teams and managing complex projects from concept to production Interested candidates drop there cv on  hr.recruiter2@efclimited.in

column2: JOB   DESCRIPTION   MS   STRUCTURE   DESIGNER Job Type: Full Time/Permanent  Experience: 1 - 3years  Salary: 2LPA - 2.25LPA JOB   BRIEF We are 30 years old furniture manufacturing company dealing with commercial projects based in Coimbatore. We are looking for a self-motivated designer who can work alongside a number of specialists at our company. The Mild Steel Fabrication Drawing Designer is responsible for creating accurate and detailed fabrication drawings for structures, components, and assemblies made from mild steel. This role requires expertise in interpreting engineering designs and specifications to produce drawings that adhere to industry standards and client requirements. KEY   RESPONSIBILITIES: ??Understand and interpret engineering designs, blueprints, and specifications to develop fabrication drawings for mild steel structures and components. ??Utilize computer-aided design (CAD) software to create detailed fabrication drawings, including plans, elevations, sections, and assembly drawings. ??Select appropriate mild steel materials based on project requirements and specifications. Specify material grades, dimensions, and tolerances in fabrication drawings. ??Ensure dimensional accuracy and adherence to tolerances in fabrication drawings to facilitate precise manufacturing and assembly processes. ??Ensure that fabrication drawings comply with relevant industry standards, codes, and regulations governing mild steel fabrication, such as ASTM, AISI, and AWS standards. ??Collaborate with engineers, architects, project managers, and other stakeholders to incorporate design changes, resolve issues, and optimize fabrication processes. ??Review fabrication drawings to ensure accuracy, completeness, and compliance with project requirements before final approval. ??Maintain accurate documentation and records of fabrication drawings, revisions, and design changes throughout the project lifecycle. ??Stay updated on industry trends, technologies, and best practices in mild steel fabrication design to enhance efficiency and quality in drawing production.  QUALIFICATIONS: ??Bachelor's degree or equivalent in mechanical engineering, civil engineering, or a related field. ??Proficiency in computer-aided design (CAD) software, such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks, or similar programs. ??Strong knowledge of mild steel properties, materials, and fabrication processes. ??Excellent technical drawing skills with attention to detail and accuracy.  ??Familiarity with relevant industry standards and codes governing mild steel fabrication.  ??Effective communication and collaboration skills to work within multidisciplinary teams.  ??Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines under pressure. EXPERIENCE: ??Previous experience in mild steel fabrication design, drafting, or related roles is preferred. ??Experience working in manufacturing, construction, or engineering industries is advantageous. ??Familiarity with project management principles and practices is a plus. * Interested candidates send your updated CV through Mail on  hr@zenfurniture.in CONTACT   PERSON ZEN HR  9080506567 ABOUT   US:   https://www.zenfurniture.in/

column2: Role & responsibilities   CAD System Administrator is to be a technical expert on the IT team who will be responsible for analysis, installation, version upgrades of various CAD & Engineering softwares, and to ensure integrity of files and data. CAD System Administrator will be responsible to capture the business requirements and must be able to provide effective solutions for Companys Global operations.    Provide Technical Support for software programs listed below. Assist in loading software and updating libraries, catalogs, SmarTeam/CATIA/NX macros (automation), and other customization of CAD programs. Serve as point of contact for CAD associates to communicate OEM upgrades, resolve inquiries, provide CAD software support. Update & maintain CAD software versions for CAD Users. Work to identify potential issues and recommend/implement preventative solutions. Identify and analyze system and user needs, including hardware. Assist in maintaining drawing border templates for CATIA, NX, SolidWorks. Provide support for plotting and electronic file submission. CAD software version control based on OEM requirements. Develop, implement, and enforce CAD design standards. Develop and deliver user training and/or presentations on new systems and upgrades. Work proactively with users to understand business processes and make recommendations for improvements. Communicate changes to business users/customers/suppliers, for work in queue. Identify opportunities & implement Best Practices with the global IT & Engg department. Track and maintain the status of assigned open items in ticketing system. Provide training to users as needed on the proper use of systems, softwares and services. Ability to travel internationally (up to 10%), and on short notice to support global operations. Available for occasional communication during early morning / late night with global users. Additional functions not specifically outlined in this position description as directed by the leader. Preferred candidate profile     Experience      with CAD customization and scripting languages (e.g. VBScript, CAD      customization). Knowledge      of PLM (Product Lifecycle Management) systems, preferably Teamcenter Familiarity      with cloud-based CAD solutions and collaboration platforms. Understanding      of IT security principles and practices. List of Softwares to Support:  CATIA and NX                                        Product Design SolidWorks                                             Equipment Design and Installation Hyperworks and LSDyna                        CAE AutoCAD                                                           ??Tool Design/Detailing and Plant Layout Teamcenter                                            ??OEM Product Data Mgmt. SmarTeam                                              ??Corp CAD Product Data Mgmt. SolidWorks ePDM                                  ??Equipment Design Product Data Mgmt. Cenit                                                       ??Off-Line Laser Programming Moldex 3D                                             ??Plastics CAE   Work Timing:  Resource will work at least 50% under US time zone (during 8 am ??12 noon US-EST). column1: UX and Graphics Designer - Sustainable Energy Lab
column2: This will be a joint position between the IoT Lab and the Sustainable Energy Lab at the Indian Institute for Human Settlements (IIHS). The deisigner will help develop the most sophisticated sustainability dashboard of any university in the world, that will talk to a variety of audiences, and do data management for the campus AI control systems. S/he will also help develop graphics, videos and animations for Solar Decathlon India (SDI), the largest Net Zero Building challenge in the world.     Applicants should have strong skills in information design, UX coding, web design, animation and videos and a science-based sensibility to tackle technical issues. A passion for sustainability and climate action would be an added avantage. Previous work experience matters, but skills, abilities and sensibilities matter more.     This is a contractual position for an initial term of 11 months, renewable on mutual consent, with the potential to turn into a regular position over time.         Activities and Tasks       Responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following:       Helping lead the development of dashboards and graphics;         Researching contemporary methods of dashboards to influence behavior, and informing various stakeholders;         Coordinating with other teams at IIHS to understand their use-cases for the data collection;         Coordinating the metering and sensor installation, verifying and managing data for the dashboards and AI controls, and making observations to aid future installations;         Assisting with developing controls and algorithms for the AI controls;         Writing case studies and papers, and making presentations;         Developing graphics and designing for events, brochures, reports, and other collaterals;         Editing videos and making animations;         Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others;         Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and traveling on IIHS work within or outside the country as and when needed.         Structure and Reporting       The UX and graphics designer will be an External Consultant coordinating with the Senior Advisor SEL and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organisations, and students.         Person Specification       The ideal candidate should have:       1-5 years of work experience;         Bachelor s or Master s in Design, Architecture, Engineering or Science with appropriate combination of coursework and work experience;         A strong foundation in science, design and understanding data;         A strong command of graphics and design;         A basic knowledge of python, R or other programming language;         Good documentation skills for graphics and writing;         Good communication skills to work with diverse teams within and outside IIHS.       Software skills:       MS Office Word, Excel, Powerpoint;         Design Builder/ Energy Plus/ Open Studio/ eQuest/ Grasshopper;         Grafana or similar dashboard design software;         Photoshop, Premier Pro;         SketchUp / Rhino 3D / 3DS MAX / Blender (desirable).
column11: Graphics, Communication protocols, Data management, Simulation, Coding, Data collection, Animation, Photoshop, Monitoring, Python

column2: We have Immediate opening for INSTRUMENTATION DESIGNER/ ENGINEERS, if you are interested kindly reply for the mail or contact through below mentioned mobile no. Job Title: SENIOR INSTRUMENTATION DESIGNER Location   : CHENNAI Company    : Wingrow Tech Services India Private Limited. Experiences      : 5 Year to 20 year Job type          : contract and Permanent   Job Description: Perform Instrumentation 3D modelling design activities. Prepare Instrumentation bulk material specifications. Prepare Cable Routing layouts and Location layouts using ACAD/Micro station. Prepare Instrument Installation drawings and all types of Hookups. Prepare Instrument BOQ and MTO  SPI tool Software: Auto CAD/Plant, Micro station, PDMS, Smart Plant SP3D Responsibilities: Utilize MicroStation, AutoCAD, PDMS, and SPI software for comprehensive instrumentation design, including SPI modelling, control valve sizing, cable tray routing, equipment modelling, loop drawings, and hookup drawings. Lead the team in SPI modelling, SPI control valve sizing, and cable tray routing, ensuring accuracy and adherence to project specifications. Perform equipment modelling and generate loop drawings with meticulous attention to detail. Utilize SPI tools for data sheet calculations and ensure compliance with industry standards. Collaborate closely with engineers, project managers, and other stakeholders to develop innovative solutions and ensure project success. Provide mentorship and guidance to junior team members, fostering their professional growth and development. Conduct thorough reviews of designs to identify opportunities for optimization and improvement. Act as a subject matter expert, providing technical support during all project phases, from concept development to commissioning. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Instrumentation Engineering, ITI, Diploma.  5-20 years of progressive experience in instrumentation design, with a proven track record of success. Proficiency in MicroStation, AutoCAD, PDMS, and SPI software is essential. Strong expertise in SPI modelling, control valve sizing, cable tray routing, equipment modelling, loop drawings, and hookup drawings. Extensive experience in data sheet calculations using SPI tools. Thorough understanding of industry standards and codes, with a commitment to excellence and compliance. Excellent problem-solving abilities and a keen attention to detail. Exceptional leadership and communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse teams. A passion for innovation and continuous improvement, with a drive to stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends. column1: Instrumentation Engineer-Coimbatore - Opening with MNC Company Payroll
column2: Hi , Please share Your Resume on this mail id - Jasmine.d@randstad.in Job Position- Instrumentation Engineer Location- Coimbatore Experience Range - 08 Yrs to 12 Yrs  Opening with Good Brand Company Payroll - Role & responsibilities     Create or review the instrumentation design basis and project specifications. Provide technical requirement for instrumentation and preliminary MTOs for  instrumentation bulk material during proposals. Perform technical bid analysis on quotes received from supply chain. Provide inputs to other disciplines during project execution. Participate in engineering meetings. Responsible to deliver instrumentation engineering documents as per project schedule and in accordance to project budget. Provide engineering hours estimate during proposals for its discipline. Responsible for tracking engineering hours for its discipline during project execution. Participate in peer review of P&IDs and provide inputs as required. Define type of instrumentation that is required during Activities project execution. Develop all instruments datasheets, material selection and technical specification to be included in the technical requisition during project execution. Define together with vendors, control valves and flow measurement instruments. Develop all instrumentation detail drawings and hook ups during project execution. Perform technical bid analysis of all instrumentation and instrumentation bulk material. Provide feedback to vendors. Review, comment and approved all outsourced instrumentation engineering. Review, comment and approved all instrumentation vendors documentation. Participation and close out action items client or internal HAZOP meeting and Factory Acceptance Test (FAT). Define and review deliverables for SIL studies. Lead and assist junior Instrumentation engineers/designers when developing engineering deliverables. Maintain state-of-the-art knowledge in its discipline in accordance to applicable codes and standards. Provide support to processing facilities as required by Operations on engineering/technical matters. Ability and willingness to travel, as required to fulfil project and business needs. Actively support, participate in, and maintain the integrity and on-going function of the company and facility HSSE program, ensuring a safe/healthy work environment.
